conversations.content: Hmmm...
Something on your mind, Siren? You look awfully pensive.
Oh, hey, Mym. So, here's the sitch...
Is that all? I've got you covered, hon. Here, come with me!
Daaarling! Pop star season is here!
It...is?
Yep. Siren's planning to put on a big show with some of her musically inclined pals!
Y'know, like Lucretia and Giovanni!
I see. That sounds fun.
But there's ONE thing we're still missing. Can you guess what that might be?
Er... I'm drawing a blank.
Here's a hint: you know how Siren and the others are all top-tier performers?
The thing is, they're SO good that their shows can be a little intimidating for first-timers.
What we really need is an act that'll capture the heart of the average person.
And that's where you come in, darling!
I'm not sure I follow.
We want you to form a brand-new boy band and knock everyone's socks clean off!
You'd be doing your girl Siren SUCH a solid. Pretty please?
You want me to be a pop star? I mean, I do want to help you, but... I don't know if I'm cut out for that.
His Highness has enough duties as it is. I hardly think it appropriate to—
Elisanne. Sidebar?
(C'mon, don't you wanna see my darling flashing that gorgeous smile your way? Or maybe even—gasp—WINKING at you?!)
...That does sound nice.
I know, right? So just play along!
Your Highness! I believe there is merit in giving this ＂pop star＂ venture a try.
Wait, really? What made you change your mind?
Your smile brings hope and courage to the citizens of this land.
This is something only you can do. We'll do everything we can to support you, so please! The world needs you!
You're awfully enthused about this...
Well? Are you in? Sounds like you're in!
Well, okay... If you really think I'm the right man for the job.
Yippee! Next order of business is to fill out the rest of the group.
Ladykillers, come on down!
And so, the auditions began.
Next!
Next!
One order of meat, comin' right up!
Next!
Oh, c'mon! You didn't even try it!
It's finally over...
It sure is! That takes care of the whole lineup. This summer, the lucky gents who get to stand on stage with Euden are...
Now, hold yer horses!
I'd totally fit in with these guys! I mean, I've got the swimsuit 'n everything!
Well... You do have a certain Ranzal-y appeal. And you DID grill for us...
But you're just not boy-band material!
Bwargh!
Moving on... I'm sure all you boys are gonna sparkle out there. Congratulations on your pop star debut!
Wait. What? Who's a pop star?
Uh, you? Duh-doy. That's what you just auditioned for, remember?
I...did? Wait, you mean when you forcibly dragged me here and told me to, and I quote, ＂show off them skillz＂?
Right-o!
I see... So that was an audition. I too underwent such an ordeal.
Such underhanded techniques. And for something as pointless as a boy band? I don't have time for this.
You guys sure this is gonna work out okay?
Ha ha ha...
All right, everybody, eyes on me! Your new boy band will be called...drumroll please...
Uh-huh.
Oh, come on! We worked really hard on this, you jerk!
No need to blow your top, Mym. We've got our soon-to-be stars wrangled together, so let's just dooo thiiis thaaang!
Burning up the summer stage, it's the SUMMER SIZZLERS! They're so hot, they'll melt your heart!
(I have a feeling we're in for one memorable summer...)
Cut, cut, cut! That was TERRIBAD, guys.
*pant* *pant* I think I'm gonna keel over...
＂Siren＂? More like ＂tyrant.＂
You wanna know why? 'Cause the stage isn't just a place of dreams and wonder. It's a battlefield, too!
If you put on a shoddy show, you'll be in for a world of hurt. Ever been booed off a stage with a flurry of garbage? Not fun.
We certainly wouldn't want that. The road to stardom is arduous indeed.
That's right! So if you wanna make this gig a success, you need to go HARD in these lessons. I wanna see back sweat, boys!
This is ridiculous. YOU are ridiculous. I'm leaving.
Ah—Leonidas!
And there he goes... Oh well. Guess that's a wrap for today.
I'd say so. I'm exhausted. Outdoor stuff is so not my forte.
It wouldn't do to push ourselves. Shall we disperse and rest?
Uh, sure...
Everyone's falling apart... Is our boy band doomed to fail before their first show?
We need a way out of this mess.
Oh, Leonidas. So this is where you went.
Ah. It's just you.
The sunset sure is stunning, isn't it?
Indeed. The way it dyes everything in its scarlet hues is remarkable. There is no better time of day to behold the sea.
Hey, Leonidas? Would you consider giving our boy band a second chance?
The way things are now, we're on a fast track to early retirement.
I do not understand. What do you hope to accomplish with this?
I know you engage in this kind of frivolous nonsense in between battles from time to time. But what is the point of it?
I understand how it looks. But no matter how frivolous it may seem, it's important for me to give everything I do my all.
I believe that in doing so, I can strengthen the bonds I've made with others—and maybe even form new bonds as well.
Bonds, you say...
Do you think that's nonsense too?
I'm sure that I would have in the past.
Now I know all too well that these ＂bonds＂ we forge can lead us to a better future. You were the one who taught me that.
So there is meaning in this fribble after all. I suppose there's no harm in trying new things.
Leonidas! Does that mean you're back in the band?
Indeed. But know that I find half-measures to be anathema. I do hope you're prepared.
You there! You're too slow!
Right!
Luca! Mind your posture!
Roger that!
Y'know, I almost thought we weren't gonna make it! Thank goodness Leonidas decided to come back to us.
He pulled the whole group back together like, uh...like some kind of mega hair tie! They're sooo much better than they were yesterday. I barely even recognize them!
You can say that again. I think we have a fighting chance now.
Speaking of bringing people together! Why don't we figure out who's gonna be the leader of you little stud muffins?
Given his credentials, I'd say Leonidas is probably the best man for the job.
I refuse.
Why's that?
Because there is someone far more suited for the role than I.
You don't mean...
It has to be you, Brother. Does anyone object to that?
Not at all.
I think he'd be a great fit!
Sweet! Then that settles it. Euden's gonna be our main man!
Well, if you all think that's best... I accept. I'll give it all I've got!
Hoo to the ray! Now that that's settled, let's get on with our next lesson.
But we've already done dancing and singing. What else is there?
Weeell, if there's one thing that pop stars are reeeally known for, it's working the  crowd!
Listen up, boys, 'cause I'm gonna teach you how to turn those fans into STANS!
What's a ＂stan＂...?
(Sounds like we've got our work cut out for us...)
Professor Mym presents... Crowd Pleasing 101!
Uh, was Siren not available, or...?
Rude! There's no one who fantasizes about my beloved darling more than me.
Cool non-sequitur. How does that make you qualified to teach this, though?
Because clearly, I understand what the fans want more than anyone in the world!
This is a by-the-people, for-the-people kind of lesson. I'm gonna teach you how to work the crowd 'til they're putty in your hands!
Uh...
Don't bother. Nothing she says will make sense. Let's just get started.
Why don't we start by having you show me how you'd do it based on gut intuition?
O...kay? I don't really—
This is all about FEELING. You're showing the fans just how much you love them! Now go!
Er... ＂Hey, everyone! Are ya having fun?!＂
Oh, come on! What was that?!
You can't seriously think that ham-fisted attempt is gonna get the crowd going.
Listen up, buster. The best kind of fan engagement requires love, personality, and a fun little twist!
Love, personality, and a twist... Might you elaborate on that?
Gladly! Let's have a demonstration. Hmmm... Leonidas, come on up.
Just do as I say for this example. *whisper*
Very well.
All right, the floor is yours!
Sink into my vortex of vermilion passion. You need only entrust yourselves to me, body and soul... Are you ready, pets?
I feel I just saw a side of Leonidas we're not intended to be privy too...
THAT'S what it takes to please a crowd?!
Just so! And I'm gonna pound that into your heads until you REALLY get it, so I hope you're ready for an all-nighter!
We fought long and hard...
But once we emerged from Mym's hellish gauntlet, we were at last free from the shackles of shame!
Excellent work, everyone. Your final test is a practical one.
Get out there and show those fans the fruits of your labor. Make 'em love you!
After all we've been through, I know we can do it. Let's go, men!
Yeah!
I want to give everyone here their happily ever afters. Come, and let us weave the greatest story ever told together!
In this blazing heat, I race headlong to find you from this summer stage. I'll run forever onward until I've captured your heart. Let me set your bosom aflame!
Who is that man and what has he done with Ieyasu?!
I can feel your love charging the very air! I hope you know it's returned tenfold. You all are the reason I breathe!
LUCCY!!! OMIGOD OMIGOD OMIGOD I LOVE LOVE LOVELOVELOVELOVE YOU!!!
Hmph. You long for my affection? Then cheer to show me you deserve it.
Prince Leonidas...being affectionate?!
Come join us, everyone! We are...
The Summer Sizzlers!
You're perfect, darling. Simply perfect! I can't wait for your big debut!
What the hell did I just watch?
No idea...
It's gonna be one hot, hot summer!
In your eyes, what do you think a pop star is?
I would say...it is an entertainer who shines like the summer sun.
But isn't the world behind those dazzling performances a harsh one?
Indeed it is.
Has it ever gotten to be too much?
Well, sure. But... I know if we tried to give up, Mym would burn us to a cri—
BZZZT. Vetoed!
Can't you come up with something more sentimental? Like, ＂We endure thanks to the power of friendship!＂ or whatever?
This is going in a pamphlet, you know. If you want this thing to sell, you've gotta make it JUICY.
Ever the businesswoman, this one.
Darn straight. That's why I got Norwin to do all the illustrations for it!
So that's why we haven't seen him around.
This thing is gonna be so jam-packed with Summer Sizzlers scoops, you have NO idea.
The general public is starting to talk about you too, y'know. I'm sure your concert is gonna be standing room only!
And then the merch and these pamphlets will be flyin' off the shelves... Hee hee!
I'm glad everyone's looking forward to it. We'll have to do our best at the show.
Anyway, let's pick up where we left off. This time, gimme something to work with!
(Was that...Mym?)
(It's not like her to wander off on her own without telling anyone. I wonder what's wrong.)
*sigh*
Hey, Mym.
Oh, hello, darling.
You sure you can afford to be here? I know pop stars don't have a lot of spare time.
We're done for the day.
You came by during lunch, didn't you? Did you need something from us?
What, do I need a reason to come see you now?
Of course not. I'm sorry I put it like that. Is...something wrong, Mym?
With me, maybe. At first, I wanted you to be a pop star. I really did.
But now... I miss you so much. I feel like you're going somewhere I can't follow.
I know that's hypocritical of me. I just can't turn the feeling off.
Oh, Mym... It's okay. I'm not going anywhere.
You say that, but—
My feelings for you haven't changed. I still cherish you like I always have. How can I make you see that?
Darling...
(Such romantic words. But they're the same he uses with everyone.)
(That part of him hasn't changed at all. He's dense as can be, but he has a bigger heart than anyone I know.)
You're right. I was worried over nothing.
I hate to know you were hurting like this. Is there anything I can do to help?
(He's so charming, it's almost criminal...)
(When he looks at me like that, it makes my sadness melt away. I swear, I'm falling for him all over again.)
There is one thing.
I want you to remember that I was your very first fan!
You're sure to make plenty more after all this, but I was the first one to ever see you for the amazing person you are.
If you can remember that... I'll be okay.
Done. I'll never forget that, even when I'm up on stage.
Then I'm all set. Your concert is coming up soon. Do your best up there, darling!
Of course! I hope we can give everyone some wonderful summer memories.
At the time, I never would have thought something so terrible could happen on the day of our big show...
Can you feel our burning love for you?
Let the beat get you even more fired up!
I'll make your hearts beat crimson-hot. Now come—sing with me!
Move it! Comin' through! I said move, man!
Euden! We have an emergency!
Ranzal? What's going on?
Imperial soldiers are seconds away! If we don't hurry, the town'll be under attack!
What?!
So they ambush us amid a crowd and stir up chaos to lower our morale... Certainly a sound tactic.
What are we gonna do,  Euden?
What gives? Why'd you hype us all up and go quiet?
Get the show started already!
(Everyone's been looking forward to this concert so much...)
(If we cancel it, it'll mean all the hard work we put in this summer will amount to nothing.)
(But I know what I have to do.)
We need to get everyone to safety. Afterward, we can intercept the enemy.
I thought you'd say that. ...Even if it is a bummer.
Of course. I may be a pop star, but I'm the leader of this land first.
And right now, I have a more important job than entertaining the masses.
I have to protect their very lives! Now, let's go!
We managed to save the town, but...
The sun has already set.
They already took down our seaside stage, too. Not my favorite plot twist. I suppose it's curtains for the Summer Sizzlers.
Aw, maaan... Guess all that hard work was for nothin'.
It may have ended before we wanted it to, but I don't think it was in vain.
All that training put a ＂spring＂ in our step we'll never lose. Even if it IS summer.
It was a rather vociferous affair, but all things considered, it could've been worse.
I have to agree with the spring metaphor. It really was a light and breezy time.
I'm a bit ashamed at how indulgent I was with this venture...
Ha ha! C'mon, it's nothing to be ashamed of. Acting different from your usual self is what Mym meant by performance with a ＂twist,＂ isn't it?
Even if we weren't able to put on a show, we still had a blast practicing. That's what matters most.
Hear, hear.
Darling!
You're finally back. I was getting antsy waiting for you!
Oh! Sorry to leave you hanging.
I told you I was your very first fan, didn't I? That means never abandoning you.
And as your fan, I can't let today end like this. Neither can the rest of these folks!
The rest of...?
My goodness!
Your fans await, my love. It's your job as a pop star to send them home with some unforgettable memories!
That huge crowd waited for us all this time?!
Sounds like we're up, Brother.
Yeah!
(As the leader of a country and boy band both, I thought I had to guide everyone by my hand.)
(But it is they who have guided me.)
(With so many people out there cheering for us... We can shine even brighter than ever before!)
The Summer Sizzlers are back... and we'll never part ways again!
